pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualising Molecular Dynamics Analyses // Provides automatization for plot generation succeeding common molecular dynamics analyses. This includes straightforward plots, such as RMSD (Root-Mean-Square-Deviation) and RMSF (Root-Mean-Square- Fluctuation) but also more sophisticated ones such as dihedral angle maps, hydrogen bonds, cluster bar plots and DSSP (Definition of Secondary Structure of Proteins) analysis.
